|brand = ASUS |model = RP-N53 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 27, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RP-N53 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, range extender, audio streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RPN53 |icid = 3568A-RPN53 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1244-01000902-50Z |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = ;580 MHz; |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.25 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Audio out (3.5mm) |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_RPN53, ASUS_RPN53_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/27/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 886227446490 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00EPGKS4S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 45 x 31 x 85 mm |weight = 90 g
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT5592; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01000902-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :Default settings (including the SSIDs) are per the FCC sample label and manual.
* Dual-band concurrent range extender * Full coverage with internal MIMO antennas * One-press setup and worry-free connectivity * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app or AirPlay
This device supports audio streaming.. :this function is controllable with the ''ASUS AiPlayer'' app ([https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dlna.asus2 on Android]).
{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rp-n53}} {{•}} {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rp-n53}}
===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11abgn N600 :300Mbps (2.4GHz) + 300Mbps (5GHz) *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: AC Input : 110~240V (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 5V with max 1.2A current *Dimensions: 45 x 31 x 85 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 90 g
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyns-review-~-networking%5D-asus-rp-n53-4290051.html ''Maylyn's Review'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=11810 ''ASUS RP-N53'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Misc=== *[http://www.likelyanswers.com/6778055/MediaTek-First-To-Bring-80211ac-1t1r-dual-Band-Concurrent-Home-Networks MediaTek press release]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rp-n53 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rp-n53 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/howto-install-openwrt-on-asus-rp-n53/40525?u=tmomas |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Touch sensor at front of case, which activates a night light; 3.5mm port for audio out; }} Please insert instructions here

:;Wireless Range Extender * [[ASUS RP-AC68U]] AC1900 (450+1733Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC68U/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-AC56]] AC1200 (300+867Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC56/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (600Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product page] • [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/asus/rp-n53_serial.jpeg PCB] * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product page]
